column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////YES.  PLEASE.  Any day of the week... any time of day... I'll take it.  The food is DELICIOUS
column3: is consistently prepared so you never have surprises from one day to the next and the prices are very reasonable considering it's location.  If you're a fan of Asian noodle dishes this is very authentic and the flavors are amazing.  In addition...their Brussel sprouts (ewwwwwwww I know) are amazing and are now the only way I will ever eat Brussel sprouts.
